title: New: JUMANJI – Ark of Life
body: Which is your favourite scene from Jumanji? I love when the kid turns into a werewolf, and Robin Williams doesn’t seem remotely fussed by it, and who can forget the animals stampeding through a plush suburban household? New York’s **JUMANJI** may have the name, but aside from that, bare little resemble to the 1995 classic, yet they’re still just as awesome. _Ark Of Life_ is a wonderfully lo-fi number, appearing lackluster on first listen, however flourishing on repeated hearings. A drum machine keeps a steady pace whilst reverb drowned guitars are plucked languidly over the top, which when combined with the drawled vocals makes for a thoroughly compelling listen. _‘Because I’ll probably die before I’m 25, I’ll never fall in love I’ll never get to be your bride’_ bemoans the lead singer in a remorseful albeit slightly sarcastic manner. They may not be quite as extravagant nor as starstudded as the film, but with _Ark of Life_ **JUMANJI** have rolled the die and it’s Yahtzee’s all round. Ark of life by JUMANJI
